Job Details:
Sales manager (software) - Hybrid


About us
Medor is a recruitment firm specialised in tech and digital. Located in Indonesia, we are providing positions in Indonesia and APAC for local and international companies. 

About the customer 
Our customer is an international software house in South Jakarta working for both Indonesian and International customers. They specialize in website development, custom software development, mobile apps, and ERP solutions.

Job Description: 
The Sales Manager will be responsible for leading the sales team, developing new business opportunities, and driving revenue growth in the software sector. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in software sales, excellent communication skills, and a proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets.

Responsibilities:
Develop and implement effective sales strategies to achieve company goals.
Conduct market research to identify new business opportunities and stay updated on industry trends.
Set and monitor sales targets and KPIs for the sales team.
Identify and pursue new business opportunities through networking, prospecting, and other lead generation activities.
Build and maintain strong relationships with potential and existing clients.
Present and demonstrate software solutions to clients, addressing their needs and requirements.
Foster a positive and collaborative team environment.
Manage the entire sales process from initial contact to closing deals.
Negotiate contracts and agreements with clients.
Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and maintain long-term client relationships.
Implement corrective actions to address any shortfalls in sales performance.

Requirements:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. A master‚Äôs degree is a plus.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in software sales or selling a tech related service
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
Strong understanding of the software industry and related technologies.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
Ability to lead and motivate a sales team.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Fluency in English and Bahasa Indonesia.
Basic knowledge one of of the following : website development, custom software development, mobile apps, ERP or software as service
Skill: Business Development, Business Strategy, ERP Software, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Sales, Sales Management, Sales Processes, Software Implementation, and Software Industry

Job Details:
Company Description:
Wayzim is an industry-leading supplier of intelligent logistics equipment, intelligent vision systems and industrial sensors. One of the few international companies that have the integrated capabilities to research, develop, design, and manufacture intelligent logistics equipment systems and key components.

We have a strong interest in finding the best employees for our company and in their being committed to us for the long term. Naturally, it is our employees who inspire our customers and partners. At Wayzim Indonesia, you can take your career to new heights in a challenging and exciting global environment.

Job Description
As a Sales Expert your main functions/tasks will be:
¬∑ Commercial responsible for proposals by meeting our clients' needs.
¬∑ Acquisition of new projects with existing and new customers.
¬∑ Ensure understanding of customer needs.
¬∑ Define sales strategies on how to win new projects / customers.
¬∑ Define value propositions in projects.
¬∑ Prioritize projects to quote / not quote to optimize hit rate.
¬∑ Development of new markets, new segments / branches and new offerings.
¬∑ Customer contact on any level needed incl. management level.
¬∑ Responsible for coordination of sales process incl. SAF meetings (lead, target, quotation).
¬∑ The responsibilities cover all commercial, proposal activities.
¬∑ Thus, activities also include contract negotiations concerning performance requirements, schedules, layouts and also the complete sales pricing of the projects.
¬∑ Ensuring a confident handover to our project execution teams worldwide after contract signature.
¬∑ Know the activities of our Group Company in a project during sales phase.
¬∑ Monitor competitors.
¬∑ Keep focus on new trends / developments in the market (input to R & D roadmap).
¬∑ Responsible for the content of presentations related to the different Wayzim products.
¬∑ Learning the products, processes, business principles etc. and coach colleagues.


Job Requirements:
¬∑ You have a Bachelor or Master in Engineering or a commercial background.
¬∑ Preferably you have +5 years of experience with identifying customer needs and translating them into optimal systems.
¬∑ Preferably you have +5 years of experience with successful contract negotiations in regard to technical aspects of systems.
¬∑ Preferably experience with leading the technical part of proposals by covering all technical and pricing activities.
¬∑ You are experienced in organizing and leading a confident handover to a project execution team.
¬∑ You are strongly goal orientated and you have a holistic and strong technical mind-set and, you act with authority.
¬∑ You have a high degree of initiative, and you enjoy working in an international team
¬∑ You are fluent in English.
¬∑ You are willing to travel.

Job Titles: Consulting - Tech FSO (Financial Services) Manager/Senior Manager
Job Details:
Why should I work for Ernst & Young's Financial Services (FSO)?

We are the only professional services organisation who has a separate business dedicated exclusively to the financial services marketplace. Join Financial Services (FSO) and you will work with multi-disciplinary teams from around the world to deliver a global perspective. Aligned to key industry groups including asset management, banking and capital markets, insurance and private equity, we provide integrated advisory, assurance, tax, and transaction services.

Through diverse experiences, world-class learning and individually tailored coaching you will experience ongoing professional development. That‚Äôs how we develop outstanding leaders who team to deliver on our promises to all of our stakeholders, and in so doing, play a critical role in building a better working world for our people, for our clients and for our communities. Sound interesting? Well this is just the beginning. Because whenever you join, however long you stay, the exceptional EY experience lasts a lifetime.

The opportunity

In a world where disruption is commonplace and technology changes business at an amazing rate, we help solve complex industry challenges while helping our clients manage risk and improve their performance. As a future FSO Technology Consultant, you will help our clients in the following domains:

Business & strategic challenges: business & solution architecture, business process design for the digitization of core banking or insurance processes, digital transformation in an agile context, project / program management, business and IT alignment of digital driven business initiatives, front-to-back renewal, and design & improvement of digital operating models.
Technical matters: data science, advanced analytics embedded in core business processes, IoT, data strategy, data governance, data quality, data architecture, data management, data usage, blockchain, artificial intelligence and RPA.

As part of the team, you will work on specific projects critical to financial services current landscape, with opportunities to switch teams, as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. You will play an important part in taking EY to the next level.

To qualify for the role you must have

A Bachelor or Master's Degree in (Business) Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems Management, Mathematics, (applied) Economics or a related field of studies with an affinity for leading-edge technologies
Previous experience of at least 7 years in roles of Functional Consultant or Analyst Programmer preferably in companies in the financial services industry (payments, banks, insurance, capital markets).
Solid analytical skills
Knowledge of project management with agile, traditional and hybrid methodologies.
Advanced level of English.
Experience in team leadership.
Excellent oral and written communication skills.

If you can demonstrate that you meet the criteria above, please apply as soon as possible.
Skill: Analytical Skills, Communication, Data Governance, Data Science, Data Strategies, Digitization, Negotiation, Process Design, Team Leadership, and Written Communication

Job Details:
Siemens Digital Industries Software is a leading provider of solutions for the design, simulation, and manufacture of products across many different industries. Formula 1 cars, skyscrapers, ships, space exploration vehicles, and many of the objects we see in our daily lives are being conceived and manufactured using our Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software.

As part of our continuing growth in Southeast Asia (SEA), we are now looking for a driven and highly motivated Presales Solutions Consultant (CAD) to join our Presales team in Jakarta, Indonesia. The ideal candidate will need to have an excellent understanding of the technical aspects of software business and including a strong focus on building and leveraging relationships with our partners and selective end users, representing Siemens DISW CAD portfolio to senior levels of customers‚Äô organization, and bringing opportunities forward on a selective basis to enable timely and successful closure.

Responsibilities:

 Provide presales technical solution leadership and support for the Siemens DISW Mechanical CAD Portfolio, leveraging a combination of application and domain expertise to a variety of Siemens customers in various industries
 Bring opportunities to a technical closure through participating in the value discovery and assessment process to assist in determining the customer needs
 Develop opportunities by creative technical/commercial thinking.
 Lead technical discussions and conduct product demonstrations to customers
 Lead or assist in software proposal, and assist & verify with partners in solution proposals to customers
 Support customer product evaluations through workshop, training, and benchmarks
 Plan, coach, and support channel pre-sales teams in SEA on technical enablement and value discovery and assessment method.
 Support channel partners in technical sales process to facilitate sales of software
 Support transition from pre- to post-sales, assisting implementation team to take over.
 Funnel creation through supporting sales process and marketing events such as trade shows, presentations, seminars, etc.
 Uphold the professional integrity of Siemens at all times
 Adhere to, and promote, all core internal and customer processes relating to the effective undertaking of the role
 Undertake any business administration in line with job activity
 Undertake any other duties required by the company

Requirements:

Qualifications:

 Bachelor/Master‚Äôs Degree in Mechanical/Mechatronics/Robotics Engineering
 Good knowledge in dealing with 3D modelling and 2D drawing.
 Experience working with tools such as NX, Creo, Catia and/or SolidWorks.
 Prior industry experience working as a mechanical engineer or designer.
 Strong interest in Tech, Manufacturing, IoT and Industry 4.0 themes.
 Familiarity with PLM/PDM systems would be an added advantage.

Competencies:

 Minimum 7 or more years of CAD/PLM presales experience
 Proven track record or experience in demonstrating value as a CAD professional and ability to articulate unique selling proposition.
 Sound knowledge in GD&T, analysis, also Electrical PLC & Automation machinery.
 Ability to lead and work independently and confidently in analysing customer requirements and transform them into workable solutions.
 Ability to prioritize multiple assignments and deadlines.
 Dynamic with excellent leadership and high level of accountability
 Excellent sales and relation building skills
 Excellent communication skills in English and good presentation skills
 Ability to work well under pressure and self-motivated.
 Willing to work hard and face challenges.
 IT savvy and ability to multitasks.
 Travelling is required and ability to travel within a short notice is a must.
 Practical experience in design and/or manufacturing is a plus.

Working at Siemens Software

Why us?

Working at Siemens Software means flexibility - Choosing between working at home and the office at other times is the norm here. We offer great benefits and rewards, as you'd expect from a world leader in industrial software.

Siemens Software. Transform the everyday.
Skill: 3D Modeling, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Customer Requirements, Post-Sales, Presales, Presentation Skills, Presentations, Product Demonstration, Product Evaluations, and Technical Discussions

Job Titles: Senior Consultant - Technology Strategy and Transformation - ID
Job Details:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clientsDate: 13 Aug 2024

Service Line / Portfolios: Enterprise Technology & Performance

Location:

Jakarta, ID

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and World Impact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society‚Äôs biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

Work you will do:

 You will provide end-to-end advisory and overlay point-of-views and industry insights onto the research and analyses provided by the project teams, and seek to formulate innovative technology-enabled solutions to address our clients‚Äô business needs. 
 You will manage the assessment and business requirements gathering processes, review appropriateness of functional specifications against the problem statements/business requirements, and support solutions prototyping and architecture re-design by applying industry insights and know-hows. 
 You will engage our clients in discussions, presentations and workshops to validate technology-enabled solutions provided by the project teams, as well as perform walk-through of work products and deliverables with the clients. 
 You will develop trusted relationships with your clients and gain recognition in the marketplace for technical and advisory capabilities across the spectrum. 
 You will provide quality assurance and ensure timely delivery of work products developed by the project teams. 
 You will actively coach project teams during the execution of projects and support senior team members in maintaining operational excellence at all times. 
 You will meet clients on a regular basis to define problem statements, analyse key priorities/issues, and work with senior team members to develop responses to client enquiries, formulate proposals and produce point-of-view publications. 

Requirements: 

 A good honors Degree, preferably at postgraduate level, in Information Technology, Business Information Systems, Business, Engineering, Mathematics or related disciplines. 
 Senior consultant will require a minimum of 6 years of experience in IT management consulting. 
 Experience in both advisory as well as implementation experience in the following areas:
 IT Strategy: IT strategy development, IT governance, IT operating model, enterprise architecture 
 IT Transformation: IT sourcing advisory, program and project management advisory 
 IT Operations: IT service management, IT shared service management 
 IT Optimization: IT cost reduction, IT Merger & Acquisition 
 Understanding of current IT trends (cloud computing, big data, social media, RPA, IoT, blockchain, etc.) 
 Strong analytical skills, excellent oral and written communication skills in English, be self-motivated, and be able to work in stressful situations with changing priorities 
 Excellent problem solving skills, ability to think out-of-the-box, work under pressure and tight project timelines 
 Drive, tenacity, client focused and results oriented 
 Proven demonstration of sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities. 
 Willingness to work outside of office base and most of all‚Ä¶ 
 An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad) is a pre-requisite to fit to our short-term and long-term project assignment. 
Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.

Requisition ID: 105041

In Indonesia, the services are provided by Imelda & Rekan and other related entities in Indonesia ("Deloitte in Indonesia"), which are affiliates of Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd. Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Indonesia, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.
Skill: Business Requirements, Functional Specifications, IT Management, Implementation Experience, Management Consulting, Problem Solving, Requirements Gathering, Stressful Situations, Timelines, and Written Communication

Job Details:
An Amazing Career Opportunity for End User Business Manager, Indonesia!!! 

 Location(s): Indonesia 

 Who are we? 

HID Global powers the trusted identities of the world‚Äôs people, places and things, allowing people to transact safely, work productively and travel freely.

We are a high-tech software company headquartered in Austin, TX, with over 4,000 worldwide employees.

Check us out here: www.hidglobal.com and https://youtu.be/23km5H4K9Eo

 Role Summary: 

This role requires a knowledgeable and experienced business professional to work with a highly experienced business development team that is constantly driving an increase in HID Global‚Äô s image and sales opportunities within the Top 100 enterprises in selected industries per region. The actions of this position will result in

 Expanding HID footprint to emerging regions where end user touch had not been executed. 
 Coherent and consistent project acquisitions where HID Global will act as the ‚ÄúTrusted Advisor‚Äù to both the End-user and Influencer communities. 
 Creating pull-through sales value to the supply channel for HID Global‚Äô s products and services with main focus on Global Business Area of Physical Access Control Solutions and its Strategic Growth Initiatives. 

The region where these activities are foreseen is Indonesia. Successful candidates will be able to scope out growth verticals and solution scope required for the region in access control. The professional shall feel at home being ‚Äúvoice of HID‚Äù in front of C level people, senior managers, decision makers and convey relevant message with the team.

 As our  End User Business Manager,  you‚Äôll support HID‚Äôs success by: 

 Identify, prioritize, schedule, pursue, and deliver strategic Key End-user sales and project opportunities for target fulfillment. 
 Understand the business models and business priorities of the Key End-user accounts as it relates to security. 
 Build long term relationships thru direct and indirect touch. 
 Advise and schedule the deployment of required Key End-user programs to address individual End-user needs. 
 Cooperate with and coordinate company internal vertical business development, consultant business teams and technical resources to effectively communicate the expansion / transition to future technology. 
 Provide educational/awareness briefings for End-users to reinforce HID Global‚Äô s role as ‚ÄúTrusted Advisor‚Äù. 
 Use of innovative marketing tools to nurture this relationship. 
 Orchestrate Key End-user seminars to better understand the required features & functions of future technologies. 
 Deliver Key End-user presentations during ‚Äúface to face‚Äù introductory meetings. 
 Attend applicable industry tradeshows, meetings and other HID internal and external events, especially with focus on speaking and presentation opportunity. 
 Maintain a high degree of product knowledge, more on the spectrum/benefit/road map level and represent region‚Äôs status, requirements and asks to larger Physical Access Control Solutions organization. 
 Provide timely and accurate monthly status report of group activities and progress using SFDC. 
 Cooperate with vertical marketing for end user focused tools: Development of whitepapers, brochures, web presence, speaker engagements, end user events, dedicated list procurement and lead nurturing. 

 What we will love about your background: 

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Familiar with Physical Access Control, IoT, Software-as-a-Service models, strong enterprise software experience, and an understanding of information technology.

 Your Experience and Education include  :

 Bachelor Degree, preferably in Engineering, MBA from Marketing or Business etc. 
 Minimum 10+ years‚Äô experience in driving new business within access control and a cloud-based platform and services organization in a role that required external-facing engagement with end users/partners. 
 Very solid knowledge base and network of End Customers in the territory. 
 Formal experience to carry Vertical Knowledge.

 Deep experience in SaaS, Applications, Software Services industry with understanding of key partner business drivers and ecosystem. 
 An analytical, data driven approach to making decisions and choosing direction. 
 Must have strong written and verbal skills with the ability to lead presentations. 
 Capable of establishing credibility with sales force and customers. 
 Strong leadership skills with cultural sensitivity and experience in influencing diverse teams. 
 Ability to think critically and creatively and to contribute in a team environment. 

Language Skills

Computer Skills

Work Requirements

#enduserbusinessmanager#sales#HIDJobs

We make it easier for people to get where they want to go!

On an average day, think of how many times you tap, twist, tag, push or swipe to get access, find information, connect with others or track something. HID technology is behind billions of interactions, in more than 100 countries. We help you create a verified, trusted identity that can get you where you need to go ‚Äì without having to think about it.

When you join our HID team, you‚Äôll also be part of the ASSA ABLOY Group, the global leader in access solutions. You‚Äôll have 61,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions ‚Äì supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally. As we welcome new people on board, it‚Äôs important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

Job Details:
In this role, you will be responsible for continuous improvement (CI) activities,cross-function CI strategy, and demonstrate Safety, Health, Environment, and Quality System Management implementation. In your new role, you will:

Responsible for continuous improvement (CI) activities by identifying areas for improvement and implementing changes that increase optimization, and excel overall performance of Quality, Cost, Delivery, Safety, and Morale aspects.
Cross-function CI strategy and continuous improvement mindset within Operations Excellence scope.
Demonstrate Safety, Health, Environment, and Quality System Management implementation.

You are best equipped for this task if you have:

Minimum 3 years of Semiconductor experience, or relevant industries (MNC, Electronic)
Having background in Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma Approach
Strong interpersonal skills to communicate with all functional units and levels
Good systematic thinking and planning skills
Strong in designing and conceptualizing solutions

#WeAreIn for driving decarbonization and digitalization.

As a global leader in semiconductor solutions in power systems and IoT, Infineon enables game-changing solutions for green and efficient energy, clean and safe mobility, as well as smart and secure IoT. Together, we drive innovation and customer success, while caring for our people and empowering them to reach ambitious goals. Be a part of making life easier, safer and greener.

Are you in?

We are on a journey to create the best Infineon for everyone.

This means we embrace diversity and inclusion and welcome everyone for who they are. At Infineon, we offer a working environment characterized by trust, openness, respect and tolerance and are committed to give all applicants and employees equal opportunities. We base our recruiting decisions on the applicant¬¥s experience and skills.

Please let your recruiter know if they need to pay special attention to something in order to enable your participation in the interview process.
Skill: Communication, Concept Generation, Interpersonal Skills, Morale, Optimization, Quality System, SQL, System Administration, Systems Management, and Troubleshooting

Job Details:
Key Responsibility
1. Analyze business and system requirements to design effective solutions.
2. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and document technical requirements.
3. Create detailed system specifications and architectural designs.
4. Work closely with developers to ensure that programming aligns with system requirements.
5. Understand coding in languages such as Python, Java, or C++ to effectively communicate with the development team.
6. Understand IoT protocols, security concerns, and data management.
8. Collaborate with hardware and software teams to implement IoT projects.
9. Communicate technical concepts clearly and effectively in English.

Requirement:
1. Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or a related field.
2. Proven experience as a System Analyst, with knowledge of programming and IoT with minimum 3 years.
3. Fluency in English, with excellent communication skills.
Skill: Analytical Skills, Business Analytics, Communication, Computer Science, Databases, System Development, System Requirements, Systems Analysis, and Technical Requirements

Job Details:
Responsibilities

Conduct customer visits and surveys to gather the necessary information and documentation for assessing customer eligibility
Thoroughly evaluate the condition of collateral (property/land/building) and provide recommendations on the value of the collateral in the system
Ability to compare and collaborate with KJPP on property valuation, as well as verify the collateral value by conducting at least three (3) valid data comparisons in the surrounding area
Demonstrate commitment to a target number of visits and comply with SLA processing time and SOP implementation
Perform the know-your-customer (KYC) process, validate documents, verify collateral, and identify potential fraud
Have a keen understanding of property value and ownership (ownership title) and conduct on-site verification with customers

Requirement

Minimum Bachelor's or Master's Degree from a reputable university
Minimum of 3 years of industry experience in the evaluation of SME, Micro SME, or Commercial Loans
Proficient understanding of property valuations across different areas, including the ability to identify factors that may affect the value of collateral
Thorough knowledge of the credit process and underwriting, covering loan submission, documentation, appraisal policy, collateral approval analysis, collateral security title, and legal document review
Demonstrates exceptional attention to detail and a high level of interest in analyzing customer data
Highly accountable with a strong sense of integrity, commitment, and discipline

About Moladin

Moladin is Indonesia‚Äôs leading mobility fintech platform with end to end financing solutions for all players in the used car and EV ecosystem. Moladin empowers its rapidly growing network of more than 26,000 active used car agents and dealer MSMEs, and provides used car consumers with better financing access through digitized loan underwriting. This is supported by its strong used car capabilities with branches and warehouses covering more than 100 cities, industry-leading AI / IoT and partnerships with all top auto financing companies across Indonesia, and also through its OJK-regulated multi-finance company PT Moladin Finance Indonesia. Moladin‚Äôs vision is to be a positive driving force in the physical and social mobility of all the people it touches (‚ÄúMobility for all‚Äù).

For further information about Moladin, please visit https://moladin.com

Job Details:
Job Responsibilities:

Design and develop IoT devices and systems for data collection, including hardware selection, firmware development, and software integration.
Deploy and maintain IoT devices in various outdoor and indoor environments, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.
Integrate IoT devices with existing data infrastructure and platforms.
Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to IoT devices and systems.
Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to optimize data collection and processing.
Stay updated on the latest IoT technologies and industry trends.


Job Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
Strong understanding of IoT concepts, protocols (e.g., BLE, Wi-Fi, cellular), and hardware platforms.
Proficiency in embedded systems development, including firmware programming and hardware interfacing.
Experience with sensor integration and data acquisition.
Knowledge of cloud platforms and data transmission protocols.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Passion for technology and a desire to build innovative solutions.
Experience with computer vision hardware and software.
Knowledge of data security and privacy best practices.
Experience with low-power wireless technologies.
Skill: Bluetooth, Internet of Things (IoT), and Problem Solving

Job Details:
Responsibility :
‚Ä¢ Memvalidasi dan memverifikasi kebutuhan bisnis klien sesuai dengan dokumen pre-sales.
‚Ä¢ Melakukan konfigurasi dan menyiapkan sistem aplikasi sesuai dengan kebutuhan klien.
‚Ä¢ Menjalankan dan memastikan kelancaran aktivitas proses migrasi data dari sistem lama ke sistem Bimasakti.
‚Ä¢ Melakukan testing secara menyeluruh untuk penambahan fungsi baru seperti: fitur, print out, laporan, formula, dan lainnya sebelum diinstalasi pada klien.
‚Ä¢ Melakukan pelatihan kepada user serta mempersiapkan seluruh dokumen yang dibutuhkan dalam pelatihan.
‚Ä¢ Memastikan penambahan/perubahan kebutuhan klien dapat dikelola dengan baik, tercatat dalam dokumentasi dan dikomunikasikan dengan project manager.
‚Ä¢ Merencanakan, membuat, merevisi dan menghasilkan seluruh dokumentasi yang diperlukan dalam implementasi.

Kualifikasi :
‚Ä¢ Gelar Sarjana (S1) dalam Ilmu Komputer / Teknologi Informasi,, S1 Teknik Elektro /D4 teknik otomasi.
‚Ä¢ Pengetahuan yang baik tentang DFD, Diagram Alir, use case, ERD.
‚Ä¢ Ketajaman bisnis yang kuat, termasuk keterampilan komunikasi lisan dan tertulis.
‚Ä¢ Keterampilan memecahkan masalah yang sangat baik.
‚Ä¢ Keterampilan organisasi yang sangat baik dengan perhatian tinggi terhadap detail.
‚Ä¢ Kemahiran bahasa Inggris baik lisan maupun tulisan.
‚Ä¢ Kemampuan berpikir analitis dan presentasi yang kuat.
Skill: Analytical Skills, Communication, Data-flow Diagrams, ERD, English, and Problem Solving

Job Titles: (Global ICT) Cloud AWS Azure Solution Architect Engineer
Job Details:
About the Company
 


Our client is a multinational Chinese employer which is providing network tools, network services, and telecommunication related needs. Our client's headquarter is based on Shenzhen, Guangdong who's established in 1987. This company is starting to produce phone switches, and now developed into creating the telco network providers which is not only tools, but also the complex service for domestic and international coverage. Their products are reaching more than 170 countries with more than 195,000 employees.
 We are seeking a skilled Solution Architect to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of the business scenarios of large and medium-sized enterprises and experience in cloud architecture, particularly with Huawei Cloud. You will work closely with IT, application architecture, and other personnel within the enterprise to analyze and optimize existing IT architectures and drive the implementation of design solutions.
 Key Responsibilities:
 Business Collaboration and Analysis:
  Understand the business scenarios of large and medium-sized enterprises.
Collaborate with IT and application architecture teams to analyze and optimize existing IT architectures.
Promote the implementation and delivery of design solutions provided by pre-sales architects.
 Solution Design and Implementation:
  Utilize Huawei's cloud products and solution capabilities for demand analysis, solution design, solution presentation, POC verification, professional service delivery, and traditional IT to cloud architecture design.
 Presales and Revenue Generation:
  Conduct presales activities for Huawei Cloud and incorporate revenue generation as part of the KPI.
 Technical Trend Monitoring:
  Stay updated with the latest technical trends in cloud, AI, IoT, and other emerging technologies.
 Competitor Analysis:
  Understand major cloud competitors such as AWS, Azure, and their key technologies, solutions, and services.
 Feedback and Improvement:
  Provide feedback on issues in customer management and post-sales service systems.
Implement systematic and continuous improvements.
 Customer Communication:
  Regularly communicate with major customers (on-site or remotely) to ensure the healthy and stable operation of the cloud business, enhancing the customer experience.
 Performance Evaluation:
  Meet performance KPI evaluation criteria.
 
 Candidate Requirements 
Presales experience is a must.
Educational Background:
  Degree in Electronic Information Engineering, Communication Engineering, Computer Science and Technology, Network Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Automation, Information Engineering, Information Science and Technology, Software Engineering, Optoelectronic Information Engineering, Electrical Information Engineering, Computer Software, or related fields.
 Technical Experience:
  Experience in architecting, operating, and migrating solutions built on virtualized (compute, network, and storage) and cloud platforms such as Huawei, AWS, Azure, and GCP is an added advantage.
Minimum of 5 years of experience in cloud projects.
 Language Skills:
  Proficiency in speaking, reading, and writing in English and Chinese.
Strong presentation skills and a customer-centric approach.
Comfortable providing technical training to customers and partners.
 Learning Agility:
  Eager to learn new technologies with an excellent ability to adapt and learn quickly.
 Presales Experience:
  Experience in presales is an added advantage.
Willingness to engage in presales activities is required.
 Certifications:
  HCIA, HCIP, or HCIE certification (or AWS, GCP, ALI, Azure cloud certification) is an added advantage.
 Communication Skills:
  Proactive with good communication skills.
 Cloud and Application Migration:
  Preferably have experience in cloud or application migration and online delivery.
Skill: Chinese, Cloud Computing, Competitive Analysis, Demand Analysis, English, Enterprise Solution Design, Post-Sales, Presales, Presentation Skills, and Technical Solution Design

Job Details:
Job Description
Design, develop, and optimize embedded firmware for IoT devices and sensors, ensuring reliability, efficiency, and scalability.
Collaborate with hardware engineers to define system architecture, select components, and integrate firmware with hardware designs.
Implement IoT communication protocols such as MQTT, HTTP, or etc for device-to-cloud and device-to-device communication.
Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and validation of firmware to ensure functionality, performance, and security
Debug and troubleshoot firmware issues, identify root causes, and implement corrective actions.
Document firmware designs, specifications, and test procedures for internal reference and regulatory compliance.
Collect sensor data to the device using an available interface.
Build reusable code & libraries for future use and optimize code & performance of IoT devices.
Collaborate with software engineers teams to integrate devices to servers.

Job Requirements 
Graduate from Bachelor, Diploma degree from Engineering or other related majors.
Have experience in embedded firmware development for IoT devices or embedded systems for minimum 1-2 years.
Experience with Python Programming Language (Flask) and Raspberry Pi. 
Experience of hardware/software interfacing and communication protocols (e.g., SPI, I2C, UART).
Experience with IoT Protocol Communication Data, like HTTP, MQTT, and SNMP.
Experience with IoT Connectivity Communication Data, like GSM, Ethernet, Wireless, LoRa, and other Radio Frequency Modules.
Experience with SQL & NoSQL Databases, like MySQL & MongoDB. 
Experience with Industrial Protocol Sensor (Modbus, CAN Bus).
Familiar with Linux Operating System.
Understand Basic Networking and Electronics.

Placement
Halim, East Jakarta.
Skill: Electronics, Embedded Software, Embedded Systems, Firmware, I2C, Internet of Things (IoT), Mqtt, Python (Programming Language), Raspberry Pi, and Service Provider Interface (SPI)

Job Details:
Company Overview"Vascommers" aim to deliver BRIGHT solution for your business. We have established partnerships with telecommunication companies and banks to build and develop branchless banking systems, server-based e-money systems, and internal information systems. We enhance the experience of many business lines who need to grow and spread their market area towards many cities in Indonesia. Vascomm also working in the field of Internet of Things (IoT) to develop future technology like smart homes/offices and smart cities. At Vascomm, we believe that everything can be enhanced.Developing application and systems need to be supported by the infrastructure of the system. One of the infrastructures is the database infrastructure. The one who handles those jobs is a database engineer. A database engineer work around infrastructure system and security to help installation, configuration, and deployment of server database.

Responsibilities

Design a database architecture.
Configuring the software database.
Creating a database user and giving the user the power to access data.
Participate in design and development with developers.
Ensure data integrity, and monitor and improve database performance (optimization).
Helps facilitate data (CRUD) that cannot be done by the Helpdesk and DevOps teams.
Creating database documentation.

Requirement

Educational degree in Information Engineering or System Information.
Having knowledge about Linux OS.
Understand the concepts of RDBMS and NoSQL.
Understand how to optimize the query.
Having advance knowledge on database queries an functions such as tirgger and stored procedure.
Understand the required database environment (Oracle, MySQL, MongoDB, Casandra).
Understand how to configure a database environment for development and production purposes.
Able to define database structure patterns, storage structures, and access methods.
Able to analyze and anticipate system requirements.
Being able to analyze security holes that arise from databases created.
Having experience in Postgresql is a plus
Having certification or course in related filed.
Skill: Data Architecture, Data Integrity, Databases, MongoDB, MySQL, NoSQL, RDBMS, SQL, Stored Procedures, and System Requirements
